dialogs.responseText: Sssh! You'll scare away the fish! Don't talk unless you have something to say.

dialogs.buttonText: Do you know what happened to Mound?
dialogs.responseText: Mound? He disappeared last June, haven't seen him since. There's a fortune teller in town who's pretty good at finding things, maybe ask him. His shop is the furthest down the main street of town.

dialogs.buttonText: Do you know where Mound's house is?
dialogs.responseText: Sure, it's right on the other side of Darkbourne Bridge. You can't miss it, he put up a big, ugly ad for his boat business.
